CBT involve teach patient skill help manage anxiety , relaxation , change thought , problem-solving . This study evaluate effectiveness CBT treat anxiety old adult dementia . Participants select continue study answer second set question mood , memory , concentration , certain area life . These interview question take place 2 session last total approximately 3 hour . Participants randomly assign receive either enhance usual care ( EUC ) 8 10 session CBT period 10 12 week . Each CBT session last 1 hour include meeting study staff member discus anxiety cope . Participants also complete practice activity home 20 minute per day . EUC consist regular ongoing care healthcare provider phone assessment 1-month 2-month . Following 6 month assessment , participant EUC offer Cognitive Behavior Workshop . Following in-person meeting , CBT participant receive weekly phone call 3 month , follow biweekly phone call next 3 month . Some pretreatment question ask 3 month 6 month baseline .
